title: The Witcher Special
description: Because the world has been captured by the magic of Geralt of Rivia, The Besties are diving into Netflix's The Witcher and also The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt (newly released on Switch). Toss a coin to them!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
